name: Yanh Ratchawat Hotel
description: Located in Bangkok, 4.2 km from Wat Saket, YANH Ratchawat Hotel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Bangkok National Museum is 5.3 km away and Jim Thompson House is 5.3 km from the hotel. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. The restaurant at YANH Ratchawat Hotel serves Thai cuisine. The accommodation can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Khao San Road is 4.8 km from YANH Ratchawat Hotel, while Siam Discovery is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: The Quarter Chaophraya By Uhg
description: Situated in Bangkok, 4.2 km from Wat Arun, The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a restaurant. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a kids' club, room service and organising tours for guests. Rooms include a kettle, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while certain rooms have a balcony and some have city views. At the hotel each room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. You can play billiards and table tennis at The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG, and car hire is available. Staff speak English, Thai and Filipino at the reception. Wat Pho is 4.2 km from the hotel, while Temple of the Emerald Buddha is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 30 km from The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG.

name: Voque Hotel & Serviced Residence Sukhumvit 51 - Sha Plus
description: Situated in Bangkok, 1.6 km from Emporium Shopping Mall, VOQUE Hotel & Serviced Residence Sukhumvit 51 - SHA Plus features views of the city. The property is around 4.5 km from Central Embassy, 4.5 km from Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre and 4.9 km from Amarin Plaza. There is an outdoor pool and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms at VOQUE Hotel & Serviced Residence Sukhumvit 51 - SHA Plus are fitted with a seating area. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness centre, sauna and hot tub. You can play mini-golf at VOQUE Hotel & Serviced Residence Sukhumvit 51 - SHA Plus. Gaysorn Village Shopping Mall is 5.1 km from the hotel, while Central World is 5.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi Airport, 26 km from VOQUE Hotel & Serviced Residence Sukhumvit 51 - SHA Plus.

name: Wyndham Bangkok Queen Convention Centre
address: 388 Soi Rim Khlong Phai Singto, Rama 4 Road, Bangkok 10110
description: Thank you for choosing our Wyndham hotel. Wyndham Hotels and Resorts is an upscale, full-service brand with properties located in key business and vacation destinations across the world. It offers the comfort and amenities you would expect in a world-class hotel, including beautifully appointed public areas, thoughtfully detailed guestrooms, and distinct dining options. Business locations feature meeting space flexible for large and small meetings, as well as business centers and fitness centers. Many resorts offer golf, tennis, beautiful beaches, spas and more.Wyndham

name: dusitD2 Samyan Bangkok
address: 333 Si Phraya Road, Si Phraya, Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500
description: Set in Bangkok, 2.4 km from MBK Center, dusitD2 Samyan Bangkok offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a fridge, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at dusitD2 Samyan Bangkok. Siam Discovery is 2.8 km from the accommodation, while Siam Paragon Mall is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 26 km from dusitD2 Samyan Bangkok.

name: Adelphi Forty-Nine
description: Situated under a 20-minute walk from Phrom Phong BTS Skytrain Station, Adelphi Forty-Nine provides guests with an ideal base while visiting Bangkok. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a rooftop terrace and a swimming pool. This cosy hotel features a range of facilities, including an executive floor, a 24-hour reception and babysitting/child services. There is also free private parking on site for guests with a car. The air conditioned rooms at Adelphi Forty-Nine offer a flat-screen TV with a DVD player, as well as a private balcony. The bathrooms have a bathtub and a rain shower, and include a hair dryer, bathrobes and slippers. In-house dining options include Mallard Restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. A choice of eating options are also available in close proximity to the property. Adelphi Forty-Nine is close to Thong Lo BTS Skytrain Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Bangkok and its surrounding areas. Benjasiri Park and The Emporium are a brief walk away.Revato

name: The Quarter Ratchathewi By Uhg
description: No description found

name: Lumen Bangkok Udomsuk Station
description: No description found

name: Homm Sukhumvit34 Bangkok A Brand Of Banyan Tree Group
description: Set in Bangkok, 1.4 km from Emporium Shopping Mall, HOMM Sukhumvit34 Bangkok a brand of BANYAN TREE GROUP offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a kids' club and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel provides city views, a sun terrace and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. The units feature a wardrobe. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options. Central Embassy is 4.6 km from HOMM Sukhumvit34 Bangkok a brand of BANYAN TREE GROUP, while Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Bangkok Sukhumvit 20
address: 10, 10/3 Soi Sukhumvit 20, Sukhumvit Road, Klongtoey, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110
description: Courtyard by Marriott Bangkok Sukhumvit 20 provides a comfortable and convenient option for guests in the center of the Bangkok’s most vibrant commercial and lifestyle district, Sukhumvit. Located close to Bangkok’s central Asok intersection, surrounded by multinational offices, shopping malls, restaurants, bars and nightlife, the family-friendly hotel in Bangkok is the perfect option for business, leisure and "Bleisure" travelers alike. By combining innovative technology with style and comfort, the hotel’s modern and open lobby provides guests with the flexibility to work or relax. The hotel’s Food & Beverage outlets include the lively Reap Factory restaurant, the Twenty & One bistro-inspired hybrid of a coffee shop and wine-lovers lounge, and Cool!t Pool Bar offering tasty drinks and snacks. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout the hotel, and a well-equipped fitness center and rooftop swimming pool will help guests stay refreshed and energized.Marriott

name: Gardina Asoke Hotel & Residence
address: No. 51 Soi Sukhumvit 16 (Sammitr) Sukhumvit Rd., Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Bangkok 10110
description: Set in Bangkok, 1.7 km from Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre, Gardina Asoke Hotel & Residence - SHA Certified offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has a sauna and free shuttle service. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms are equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms also feature a kitchenette with a dishwasher, a microwave and a stovetop. At Gardina Asoke Hotel & Residence - SHA Certified the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Emporium Shopping Mall is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Central Embassy is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 27 km from Gardina Asoke Hotel & Residence - SHA Certified.

name: Arnoma Grand
description: Arnoma Hotel Bangkok is conveniently surrounded by 10 shopping malls, with Gaysorn located next door and Central World Plaza located across the road. Just 300 metres from Chidlom Skytrain Station, it features both indoor and outdoor pools. Guests can lounge by the pool’s sundeck or join aerobic and yoga classes. Arnoma Hotel has a fitness centre, hot tub, and sauna. Massage services are available. The air-conditioned rooms at Arnoma Hotel have city views of Bangkok. Each room has cable/satellite TV and a safety deposit box. A fridge and tea/coffee making facilities are also provided. Trattoria Felice Restaurant serves Italian specialities for lunch and dinner, while Ah Yat Abalone Seafood Restaurant serves fresh seafood. Drinks are available at Camelot Wine Pub. Arnoma Hotel Bangkok is 23 km from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. It is a block away from the Erawan Shrine. Airport shuttle service is available upon request.

name: The Fig Lobby
description: Set in Bangkok, 1.1 km from Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre, The Fig Lobby offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The hotel features a sauna, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. At The Fig Lobby every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or an Asian breakfast. Emporium Shopping Mall is 1.9 km from The Fig Lobby, while Lumpini Park is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi Airport, 27 km from the hotel.

name: Novotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 20
description: Novotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 20 hotel is an upscale full-service hotel that offers modern facilities and accommodations. For food loving guests we offer our full executive Sky Club Lounge, on-site GourmetBar and Food Exchange. If you're more into relaxation, come by the Infinity Pool, Kids Club and spa! Being located in the heart of Sukhumvit, Bangkok's shopping and restaurant district, the hotel is just a few minutes walk to Sukhumvit MRT and Asoke BTS station. Just hop onto our hotel Tuk Tuk service!accorhotels.com

name: Shama Yen-Akat Bangkok
address: 69 ถนน เย็นอากาศ ช่องนนทรี, Bangkok 10140
description: Situated in Bangkok, Shama Yen-Akat Bangkok is a short drive from Centralworld and provides free private parking on site. It also offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and meeting rooms. This 4-star property provides a roof garden, a safe and luggage storage. A fitness centre is available to guests wanting to keep active while away. The property also has its very own gym, Shama Gym. Shama Yen-Akat Bangkok provides 136 apartments, each fitted with a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and tea and coffee making facilities. The bathrooms have a shower and offer bathrobes. Shama Yen-Akat Bangkok's on-site restaurant, Brunch Paradiso, is a popular place to enjoy a meal. The property is less than a 45-minute drive from Suvarnabhumi Airport. Grand Palace and Parliament of Thailand are also a short car ride away.Revato

name: Staybridge Suites Bangkok Sukhumvit, An IHG Hotel
address: 89/8, 89/9 Sukhumvit 24 Alley,Khlong Tan, Khlong Toei, Bangkok 10110
description: Newest hotel on Sukhumvit, Bangkok. A home away from home! Welcome home to Staybridge Suites Bangkok Sukhumvit where you can experience a break from the travel norm. We are a brand-new hotel located right on Sukhumvit 24, Phrom Phong BTS Station, surrounded by many well-known malls like Emquartier, Emporium, Samitivej Hospital, Asoke, Embassy and many more. Our spacious suites include full kitchenettes, workspace, and living area that you can unwind and recharge your energy and feel “at home”. Put your best foot forward with our complimentary hot breakfast buffet, relax in our Japanese Onsen, sauna and outdoor pool facilities. The Den provides for a great co-working space as well as a space to unwind. Free high-speed Wi-Fi is offered to ensure you always stay connected seamlessly with your loved ones. Our central location makes this hotel a great fit for both business and leisure travel. No matter what brings you to Bangkok, why not make the most of it when you book your stay at Staybridge Suites Bangkok Sukhumvit.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Courtyard by Marriott Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport
address: 599/9 Lat Krabang Road, Lat Krabang, Racha Thewa 10520
description: Courtyard provides flexibility and choices for our guests. With locally- inspired three meal a day restaurant options, Courtyard is your destination for a great breakfast, or drinks and dinner during the evening. You'll also enjoy inviting, flexible spaces where you can work or relax, including our signature media pods, and free Wi-Fi throughout. Plus, our well-equipped fitness center will help you stay refreshed and energized. Whether traveling for business or pleasure, your stay at Courtyard is sure to be comfortable and productive!Marriott

name: Novotel Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport
description: Our 4 star hotel is the official hotel of Suvarnabhumi airport. Offering 612 guest rooms and suites made with Thai designs, our key focuses are exclusive accommodations and excellent accessibility and convenience. Providing 24-Hour Flexi with no set check-in when our guests arrive at our hotel, you have the luxury to plan your day without worrying about predetermined check-in timings. Our airport hotel also has features 8 restaurants and bars, VOUS spa, a tropical swimming pool with pool bar and more.accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Bangkok Sukhumvit 11
description: Conveniently located on the bustling Sukhumvit Soi 11, Mercure Bangkok Sukhumvit 11 is only a few minutes away from Nana BTS station and the entertainment and shopping districts. The hotel's newly renovated 232 rooms feature a breathtaking outdoor swimming pool, club lounge with business centre, modern fitness centre and 2 restaurants and bars.accorhotels.com

name: Galleria 10 Sukhumvit Bangkok by Compass Hospitality
description: Located under a 10-minute stroll from Asok BTS Skytrain Station, Galleria 10 Hotel Bangkok By Compass Hospitality offers guests an ideal base when in Bangkok. Offering free wireless internet, a restaurant and an outdoor pool, the hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Terminal 21. Galleria 10 Hotel Bangkok By Compass Hospitality has a gym with a swimming pool. There is also free private parking on site for guests with a car. Just a stone's throw from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, cable/satellite channels and a rain shower. Each has a bathroom that provides a bathtub and slippers. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning at Galleria 10 Hotel Bangkok By Compass Hospitality, and there are numerous cafés and eateries nearby. The in-house restaurant, Nomad, serves Asian, American and European cuisine. Located within walking distance of BTS Nana Station, the hotel offers a tour desk with information on what to see in Bangkok. Guests can also visit Soi Cowboy.Revato

name: Villa De Pranakorn
description: Set in Bangkok, less than 1 km from Wat Saket, Villa De Pranakorn offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The hotel provides an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guests at Villa De Pranakorn can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Khao San Road, Temple of the Emerald Buddha and Wat Pho. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International, 26 km from Villa De Pranakorn, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Parinda Hotel
description: Parinda Hotel is an excellent choice for a CLEAN and COMFORTABLE stay in Bangkok’s prime shopping and business area. This modern-style hotel takes pride in delivering top notch cleanliness and comfortable rooms. Guests consistently rate 9.3 out of 10 on cleanliness and comfort. Guests return because the hotel is clean, rooms are large, and once you step inside the hotel it is peaceful. All rooms are non-smoking and spacious at 36 sqm. with a king-size bed, 3-seater sofa, and bathrooms have a shower and bathtub. Another added convenience is free parking for guests. The hotel has a fully equipped gym and an outdoor swimming pool. But if you prefer to exercise outdoors, we are a 3-minute walk from the newly landscaped Benchakitti Forest Park with over 118 acres to explore by bicycling, jogging, or walking. Location-wise, Parinda Hotel is easily accessible with exits to both Sukhumvit and Rama4 road. The hotel is a 15-minute walk to the main Sukhumvit road for access to the Nana or Ploenchit BTS stations where popular shopping and dining areas are just 1-2 stops away. Don Mueang Airport and Suvarnabhumi International Airport are a 35-minute ride away.

name: Siam@Siam Design Hotel Bangkok
address: 865 Rama 1 Road, Opp. National Stadium, Bangkok 10330
description: Located in Bangkok, Siam@Siam Design Hotel Bangkok is within walking distance of MBK Center and provides a rooftop terrace and an infinity pool. It offers city views and free Wi-Fi. Those staying at the hotel can start their day at Swimming Pool, or use the various fitness and leisure amenities, including fitness classes. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. The hotel also has its very own fitness centre, Fitness Center. Part of the quality service at Siam@Siam Design Hotel Bangkok includes gifts such as a complimentary fruit bowl in each of the rooms. They are air conditioned and offer a mini bar, a coffee maker and a refrigerator. To start the day, guests are invited to enjoy breakfast at Siam@Siam Design Hotel Bangkok's in-house eateries, then later sit down to Thai and Asian dishes at Taan or international cuisine at Chim Chim. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail at Paradise Lost. Siam@Siam Design Hotel Bangkok is conveniently located for sightseeing in Bangkok, with the Jim Thompson House only a stone's throw away. It is also within walking distance of Siam Centre, Siam Square and Siam Paragon.Revato

name: Hyatt Place Bangkok Sukhumvit
description: Located in the Khlong Toei district of Bangkok, Hyatt Place Bangkok Sukhumvit - SHA Extra Plus Certified provides accommodation with a bar and free WiFi. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The property is a 3-minute walk from Emporium Shopping Mall and a 12-minute walk from Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre. At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Hyatt Place Bangkok Sukhumvit - SHA Extra Plus Certified have a TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms have a seating area. All units will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet, American or Asian breakfast is available daily at the property. The accommodation offers an outdoor pool. Samitivej Sukhumvit Hospital is a 14-minute walk from Hyatt Place Bangkok Sukhumvit - SHA Extra Plus Certified. Suvarnabhumi Airport is 20 km away.

name: Chillax Resort
description: Chillax Resort is 0.6 km from Khoasan Road. Boasting an infinity pool, the hotel features free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Free private parking is available on site. The hotel is 1.1 km to Democracy Monument. Grand Palace is located 1.4 km from the hotel, while Wat Pho Temple is 1.8 km away. Each air-conditioned room features a TV, minibar and en suite bathroom with shower facilities and free toiletries. For extra convenience, there is a 24-hour front desk. The hotel also includes baggage storage and safe. A fitness centre is also available. A wide range of Thai and Western cuisine can be enjoyed at Pranakhon Restaurant. Guests can also sit back and enjoy refreshing drinks, snacks and soothing music at the Kappu Lounge.

name: Syama Suite Sukhumvit 20
description: The 4.5-star Syama Sukhumvit 20 Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Bangkok. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, Wi-Fi in public areas, business center. Television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless, air conditioning, wake-up service, desk can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include fitness center, outdoor pool. Discover all Bangkok has to offer by making Syama Sukhumvit 20 Hotel your base.priceline.com

name: Aloft Bangkok Sukhumvit 11
description: Discover an oasis in Sukhumvit, Bangkok. Aloft Bangkok Sukhumvit 11 is an urban gem in a stimulating travel destination. Our hotel in Sukhumvit features loft-inspired rooms and suites with tech-smart features, free Wi-Fi and panoramic views of the Bangkok cityscape. Our hotel's prime location in Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok, places the excitement of Soi 11 at your doorstep, you can also take advantage of our complimentary hotel shuttle to the Nana BTS SkyTrain and Sukhumvit MRT subway stations for access to celebrated attractions. Bring your vision to life in versatile event spaces designed for productive corporate gatherings and flawless social affairs. Unwind at our pool after a busy day of work or exploring Bangkok with cocktails or enjoy a live entertainment at our W XYZ Bar. Aloft Bangkok Sukhumvit 11 has everything you need for Thailand business trips or vacations.Marriott

name: Floral Court Hotel & Residence Sukhumvit 13
description: In a prime location in the centre of Bangkok, Floral Court Hotel & Residence Sukhumvit 13 provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to an outdoor swimming pool and to a sauna. The property has a garden, as well as a restaurant that serves American and Mediterranean cuisine. At the hotel, every room has a desk, a balcony with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Guests at Floral Court Hotel & Residence Sukhumvit 13 can enjoy an à la carte or a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers a children's playground. With staff speaking English and Thai, guidance is available at the reception. Central Embassy is 2 km from Floral Court Hotel & Residence Sukhumvit 13, while Emporium Shopping Mall is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International, 25 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bliston Suwan Park View
address: No9 Soi Tonson, Ploenchit Rd, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330
description: Bliston Hotel offers a luxurious and tranquil retreat in Bangkok, a 3-minute walk from Chidlom Skytrain Station. It provides spa treatments, an outdoor pool and a restaurant offering foie gras. Bliston Suwan Park View - SHA Plus hotel is a 30-minute drive from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. Popular shopping areas like Central World Plaza and the Pratunam Wholesale Market are about 1 km away. Spacious with wooden flooring, the air-conditioned apartments offer ample seating area. They have well-equipped kitchens and modern home entertainment systems with cable TV. Bathrooms come with a bathtub. Relaxation options at the Bliston Suwan Hotel include a rooftop swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers and a steam bath. The fitness centre provides professional trainers to assist guests. Spa@Tonson specialises in Thai massage. Offering a fine dining experience, Artur Restaurant features prime steaks, as well as, fresh seafood. The restaurant is well-known for its Caesar salad and extensive martini menu. The hotel offers room service, babysitting and laundry services. Car rentals are also provided for added convenience.

name: The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality
description: Located in Bangkok, 1.5 km from Emporium Shopping Mall, The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The property features a snack bar, as well as a restaurant serving American cuisine. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. At the hotel each room is fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality offers certain rooms with city views, and the rooms have a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options. The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality offers a terrace. Central Embassy is 4.7 km from the hotel, while Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 28 km from The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality.

name: Maitria Hotel Sukhumvit 18 Bangkok
description: Located in Bangkok, Maitria Hotel Sukhumvit 18 Bangkok - A Chatrium Collection is within a 30-minute drive of Suvarnabhumi Airport and provides a plunge pool and a saltwater swimming pool. It offers city views and free Wi-Fi. The hotel has a fitness centre with a plunge pool and a rooftop terrace. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. All rooms are air conditioned and boast their very own seating and dining area. They feature a full kitchen, plus a private bathroom with a hair dryer, bathrobes and slippers. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Room service is also offered during certain times. Maitria Hotel Sukhumvit 18 Bangkok - A Chatrium Collection is close to Asok BTS Skytrain Station, making it easy for guests to explore Bangkok and its surrounding areas. Benjasiri Park, Soi Cowboy and Terminal 21 are a 10-minute walk away.Revato

name: Night Hotel Bangkok - Sukhumvit 15
description: A 5-minute walk from Sukhumvit MRT station and Asok BTS station, Night Hotel Bangkok is located on Sukhumvit 15. It offers a rooftop swimming pool and rooms with 42-inch flat-screen TVs. Free WiFi access and parking are available. Night Hotel Bangkok is Pet-Friendly. The stylish rooms at Night Hotel Bangkok are spacious and come with modern décor. Each room features Egyptian bed-sheet cotton and allergen-free pillows. Other amenities include a filled minibar, tea&coffee making with boiler and bathroom amenities on-demand. The hotel offers laundry and dry cleaning services. Currency exchange services are also available. Flava Restaurant offers views of Bangkok city, and serves up a wide spread of Italian and Thai dishes. The Flava Lounge provides a comfortable venue for guests to sip their cocktails. Night Hotel Bangkok is 25 km from Suvarnabhumi Airport and Don Mueng Airport. Walking distance 450 metres from Terminal 21 and Robinson Shopping Malls. Arnabhumi Airport is 31.1 km from the property.

name: Amaranta Hotel
description: A 5-minute drive from Central Plaza Rama 9 Department Store, Amaranta Hotel - SHA Plus offers spacious suites with a kitchen and a spa bath. The property features rooftop bar and pool, laundry service and a fitness centre. Guests have access to free on-site parking space and free WiFi. Hotel Amaranta is a 3-minute walk to Huai Khwang MRT Subway Station, providing great access throughout the city. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 40-minute drive away. All guest rooms are elegantly furnished with modern décor. Each unit features a flat-screen cable TV and a safety deposit box. A hairdryer is included in a private bathroom. Guests can sample international dishes at the hotel's 2 restaurants. Copper Restaurant offers a wine list and classic cocktails under an atrium in the glow of an aquarium. Thai-Italian dishes are served at Greendish Restaurant.

name: Arcadia Suites Bangkok
address: 15 Soi Nai Lert, Wireless Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330
description: A 10-minute walk from BTS Phloen Chit Station, Arcadia Suites Ploenchit Sukhumvit has an accessible setting, making it an ideal place to stay while in Bangkok. It provides complimentary Wi-Fi, a free shuttle service and an outdoor pool. This luxurious 4-star property offers a whole host of excellent facilities, such as a limousine service. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. Part of the quality service at Arcadia Suites Ploenchit Sukhumvit includes items such as a complimentary fruit bowl in each of the apartments. They are air conditioned and offer a refrigerator, a mini bar and a kitchenette. Those staying at Arcadia Suites Ploenchit Sukhumvit can sit down to international dishes at the on-site restaurant, conveniently located for those who want to stay close for a meal. Breakfast is available each morning and can be savoured in the comfort of the apartments. The property is within walking distance of Pratunam Market, Central Chidlom and Big C. It is within a 20-minute stroll of BTS Nana Station, which allows easy access in and around Bangkok.Revato

name: Lit Bangkok Residence
description: Located within a few minutes' walk of Bangkok's premier shopping destinations, LiT BANGKOK Residence - SHA Extra Plus is a stylish hotel with spacious studios and suites. With free WiFi in public areas, this hotel is 150 metres from National Stadium BTS Skytrain Station. MBK Shopping Centre, Siam Paragon and Siam Centre, which are all within a 5-minute walk, provide a variety of shopping and dining options for guests. It is 400 metres from Jim Thompson's House and 25 km from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. All air-conditioned studios and suites feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a sofa seating area and a dining table. Complete with a microwave, the kitchenette comes with a minibar and kitchenware. Extras in the room include a safety deposit box and a balcony, while suites also offer a washing machine. Free toiletries, a shower and bathtub can be found in the en suite bathroom. Guests staying at LiT BANGKOK Residence - SHA Extra Plus can stay fit at the fitness centre or sample local and international dishes at the restaurant. Staff can provide concierge services, assistance with laundry and shuttles between Hotel & Residence buildings.

name: Mercure Bangkok Makkasan
description: Conveniently located in the city center of Bangkok, Mercure Bangkok Makkasan is a 4-star hotel with easy access to the Bangkok Airport Link Makkasan Station and MRT Petchaburi. The hotel offers 180 rooms & suites designed with a modern style. The hotel facilities include an all-day-dining restaurant, wine bar, swimming pool, gym, meeting rooms and free car park. It is the perfect place for both leisure & business travelers. Pick up from MRT Petchaburi station is also available by calling at +66 21153333.accorhotels.com

name: Le Tada Parkview Hotel
description: Le Tada Parkview Hotel - SHA Plus is located in Bangkok, 2.2 km from Gaysorn Village Shopping Mall and 2.3 km from Siam Discovery. This 4-star hotel offers free WiFi. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Le Tada Parkview Hotel - SHA Plus each room includes bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers an American or Asian breakfast. Central World is 2.4 km from Le Tada Parkview Hotel - SHA Plus, while MBK Center is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 22 km from the hotel.

name: Jasmine City Hotel
description: Jasmine City Hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, a fully equipped fitness centre and free WiFi in public areas. It is a 3-minute walk to BTS Asoke Sky Train and MRT Sukhumvit Subway Stations. The property is a 5-minute walk to Terminal 21 Shopping Mall. It is a 10-minute drive to Emporium Department Store and Benjasiri Park. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 25-minute drive away. Rooms at the Jasmine City Hotel feature a fully equipped kitchen, living room and TV with cable channels. The hotel provides daily house-keeping and room service. Free wireless internet access is available in the entire hotel. An outdoor hot tub offers relaxation. Japanese translators are available upon request. Balcony Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner in a casual environment. Drinks and snacks can also be enjoyed by the pool.

name: Holiday Inn Bangkok
description: Holiday Inn Bangkok has 379 rooms and suites, and being located in the centre of Bangkok is easily accessible from both Suvarnabhumi International Airport and Don Mueang International Airport, both only about 35 minutes away. The location makes the hotel perfect for exploring the city and its shopping districts, malls and shrines. Both the BTS Skytrain Chit Lom station and the Skywalk are at the doorstep of the hotel. This means that famous shopping destinations such as CentralWorld, Siam Paragon, Siam Discovery, MBK, Central Chidlom, Platinum Mall and Pratunam Market are within easy walking distance via the covered Skywalk, while cultural attractions including the Grand Palace, Chinatown, Jim Thompson House and Chatuchak Weekend Market can all be visited using the Skytrain. Holiday Inn Bangkok provides a variety of food and beverage outlets. Ginger is an all-day restaurant offering authentic Thai and Western dishes. At Beer Republic, guests can explore the largest beer selection in Bangkok, along with European and Thai bar food, with live music daily. ConneXion, a multi-purpose lounge with natural daylight, makes an ideal place either for working or relaxing. For leisure and fitness there is a 12.5-metre pool, conveniently located next to the 24-hour fitness centre and sauna. Around-the-clock convenience stores are available in the immediate neighborhood of the hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Tinidee Hotel Bangkok Golf Club
description: This comfortable hotel in Pathum Thani provides complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as a sauna and an outdoor pool. Guests also have exclusive access to the D Health Massage and Olympic Club. Tinidee Hotel Bangkok Golf Club provides a golf course, a ballroom and facial treatments. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. Tinidee Hotel Bangkok Golf Club provides 128 air conditioned rooms equipped with all the necessities to ensure an enjoyable stay. All have a sitting area and a range of entertainment options, such as a flat-screen TV. The hotel features a conveniently located café, ideal for those who want a bite to eat without having to leave the property. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 55-minute drive from Tinidee Hotel Bangkok Golf Club. The hotel can organise car rental and an airport shuttle, in addition to offering a city centre shuttle service.Revato

name: Shama Luxe Sukhumvit Bangkok
description: Set in Bangkok, 1.5 km from Emporium Shopping Mall, Shama Luxe Sukhumvit Bangkok offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a children's playground. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a concierge service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Shama Luxe Sukhumvit Bangkok all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Central Embassy is 4.7 km from the accommodation, while Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 28 km from Shama Luxe Sukhumvit Bangkok.

name: Bandara Suites Silom
description: Located in Silom District, Bandara Suites offers rooms and suites with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. It features 2 dining options, 2 swimming pools and a pool bar. Free WiFi is available throughout. Situated in one of Bangkok City’s shopping, dining and entertainment districts, Bandara Suites is a 10-minute walk from MRT Silom and BTS Saladaeng stations. Each room and suite at the Bandara Bangkok has a minibar, tea/coffee maker and electronic safe. Attached bathrooms include a shower and bathtub. Suites come with a kitchenette. Guests enjoy a welcome drink upon arrival. Recreation facilities include a fitness centre, an outdoor hot tub, and sauna rooms. Free parking is provided. Japanese cuisine and saké is served at Touka Restaurant where there is an open kitchen.the Restaurant is open 11.00-14.00hrs. and 17.00-23.00 hrs. daily

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Sukhumvit Bangkok
description: Begin your stay at the inviting DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Sukhumvit Bangkok with a warm welcome and a delicious chocolate chip cookie upon arrival. Set in the heart of Bangkok’s major business, leisure and entertainment districts, the contemporary Bangkok hotel is close to The Emporium leisure complex and the lush Benjasiri Park and offers easy access to the Phrom Pong BTS Skytrain Station, the Expressway and Airport. All of the stylish, light and airy guest rooms at this Bangkok hotel are tastefully decorated using muted, contemporary colors and natural wood accents and offer LCD TVs and wired and wireless internet access. Upgrade to a luxurious suite for additional space and amenities. Plan your business or social event at this Bangkok hotel with a variety of flexible space available, all of which feature WiFi and the very latest in audio/visual equipment. Food lovers at this modern hotel in Bangkok will be spoiled for choice in our relaxed diner where you can savor Thai, Vietnamese and Western dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Sip cool drinks and enjoy western and Thai grilled specialties while you listen to music by live DJs in our casual poolside bar, Grillz. Keep fit in the complimentary 24-hour fitness center, or cool down with a dip in our rooftop infinity swimming pool, offering unparalleled views over the city.Hilton

name: The Narathiwas Hotel & Residence Sathorn Bangkok
description: Located a 10-minute drive to Central Rama III, The Narathiwas Hotel & Residence Sathorn Bangkok offers free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting an indoor swimming pool, the hotel provides free public parking. The hotel is a 15-minute drive to Chong Nonsi BTS Skytrain Station and Silom Shopping centre. Donmueng Airport is a 30-minute drive away, while Suvarnabhumi International Airport is a 40-minute ride from the hotel. Each modern air-conditioned room features a flat-screen cable TV, safe, sofa, fridge and microwave. Shower facilities and hairdryer are included in an en suite bathroom. For extra convenience, there is a 24-hour front desk. Laundry services are available. Helpful staff can offer assistance with shuttle service arrangements. Guests can enjoy a game of tennis, while children use the kid’s club. A wide range of Thai and International cuisine can be sampled at Nara Cuisine.

name: Riva Surya Bangkok
description: Located on the charming Phra Arthit Road, Riva Surya Bangkok offers stylish air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel is equipped with a fitness centre and two swimming pools for adults and kids. The property is a 5-minute walk to Khao San Road and a 10-minute walk to The Bangkok National Museum. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 1 hr drive away. Tastefully furnished with contemporary decor, rooms at Riva Surya feature a flat-screen TV, an iPod docking station and a safety deposit box. A minibar and an electric kettle are provided. Free toiletries and a bathrobe are included in an en suite bathroom. Some rooms come with a private balcony. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with laundry services and safety deposit box. Other conveniences include an on-site tour desk and free private parking. Guests can also enjoy the stunning views of the river from the restaurant on site. With indoor and outdoor dining options, the babble & rum Restaurant daily serves diverse and delectable authentic Thai, Asian and European cuisines. With sweeping views of the Chao Phraya River, The Garden and Mezzanine Bar offer a wide range of wine and cocktails. Room service is available upon request.

name: Hotel Icon Bangkok Sukhumvit 2
description: Located within a 10-minute walk of BTS Phloen Chit Station, Hotel Icon Bangkok is an ideal base while visiting Bangkok. The multiple amenities this modern hotel offers include a rooftop terrace, free Wi-Fi and valet parking. Hotel Icon Bangkok has a gym with a swimming pool. There is also a BBQ area available for guests to enjoy. Just a stone's throw from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore the local nightlife. The rooms are air conditioned and include a refrigerator, a flat-screen TV and a seating area. They each provide an in-room closet, a telephone and an in-room safe. Following a meal in the stylish restaurant, guests can enjoy a drink in the bar before heading onto Hotel Icon Bangkok's nightclub. Attractions near the hotel include Soi Cowboy, China Resources Tower and Terminal 21. It is within a 20-minute walk of Asok BTS Skytrain Station, which allows for easy access in and around Bangkok.Revato

name: Hope Land Hotel Sukhumvit 8
description: Set in Bangkok, 1.7 km from Central Embassy, Hope Land Hotel Sukhumvit 8 offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Ideally set in the Khlong Toei district, this hotel features a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The property is 1.9 km from Amarin Plaza, and within 1.3 km of the city centre. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also feature free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a city view. All rooms at Hope Land Hotel Sukhumvit 8 are fitted with a seating area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. For guests' convenience, Hope Land Hotel Sukhumvit 8 has a business centre. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English and Thai. Gaysorn Village Shopping Mall is 2.1 km from the hotel, while Emporium Shopping Mall is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 24 km from Hope Land Hotel Sukhumvit 8.

name: Glow Sukhumvit 5
description: Located in Bangkok, 2.7 km from Emporium Shopping Mall, GLOW Sukhumvit 5 provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. The property is 1.4 km from the city centre and 1.1 km from Central Embassy. The hotel offers an American or Asian breakfast. Popular points of interest near GLOW Sukhumvit 5 include Amarin Plaza, Gaysorn Village Shopping Mall and Central World. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Bangkok, Sukhumvit 15
description: Streamline travel with a stay at Four Points by Sheraton Bangkok, Sukhumvit 15. Our hotel sits in the city center on Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok near the retail and dining options at Pratunam Market. Travel throughout Bangkok with ease using the nearby BTS Skytrain. Relax in a spacious room or suite filled with modern amenities, including Four Points Four Comfort Beds, separate showers and tubs, floor-to-ceiling windows, large workspaces and free Wi-Fi. Upgrade to a terrace suite for a fully furnished outdoor space with views of Sukhumvit. Stay fit in our rooftop pool or 24-hour hotel gym before a meal in one of our tempting dining options, including our rooftop bar. If you're planning an event in Bangkok, Thailand, we offer elegant meeting venues with private courtyards paired with expert planning and catering services. Join us soon at Four Points by Sheraton Bangkok, Sukhumvit 15.Marriott

name: Shama Petchburi 47 Bangkok
address: 36 Soi Soonvijai, New Petchburi Rd 47, Bangkok 10310
description: Stylish and luxurious, Shama Petchburi 47 Bangkok is located in Bangkok and features free Wi-Fi, a rooftop pool and a rooftop terrace. There is also a fitness centre with a swimming pool, a sun deck and a rooftop terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a free shuttle service, a coffee bar and a beauty centre. It also includes family-friendly facilities, with room designs and services for families of any size, plus highchairs and babysitting/child services. The rooms are air-conditioned and feature soundproofed windows, a kitchenette, a kitchen and a mini bar. All provide slippers, a refrigerator and a private bathroom with bathrobes. Shama Petchburi 47 Bangkok offers a convenient café where guests can relax with a drink after exploring the area. Shama Petchburi 47 Bangkok provides on-site parking and is an easy drive from Centralworld. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Bangkok.Revato

name: Novotel Bangkok Ploenchit Sukhumvit
description: "Novotel Bangkok Ploenchit Sukhumvit is located at the heart of Bangkok's city centre, providing a convenient location for both business and leisure. We offer world class facilities, featuring an outdoor swimming pool, gym with sauna and 24/7 à la carte service. Our 4-star hotel is within walking distance to Ploenchit BTS Skytrain Station, Central Embassy and Sukhumvit Road along with attractions and shopping malls such as Siam Paragon and The Emquatier. Let us give you an experience true to Bangkok."accorhotels.com
